sentences.english: The worst part of the setup is the poor instruction manual.
sentences.chinese: 安装过程中最糟糕的部分就是差劲的操作手册。

detailed_translations.english: The setup of computer hardware or software is the process of installing it and making it ready to use

name: forward
trans: 向当前画笔方向移动dist像素长，简化为fd(dist)

sentences.english: He leaned forward , his elbows resting on the table.
sentences.chinese: 他身体前倾，胳膊肘撑在桌子上。

sentences.english: The crowd surged forwards.
sentences.chinese: 人群向前涌去。

sentences.english: The next scene takes the story forward five years.
sentences.chinese: 下一个场面是描述故事中五年后的情况。

detailed_translations.english: towards a place or position that is in front of you

name: backward
trans: 向当前画笔相反方向移动dist像素长度，简化为bk(dist)

sentences.english: She went without a backward glance.
sentences.chinese: 她头也不回地走了。

sentences.english: He works backward, building a house from the top downward.
sentences.chinese: 他倒着干活，从上往下盖房子。

detailed_translations.english: looking or facing in the direction that is behind you
If you do something backward, you do it in the opposite way to the usual way

sentences.english: Yes, that’s the right answer .
sentences.chinese: 对，回答正确。

sentences.english: Is that the right time ?
sentences.chinese: 那个时间对吗？

sentences.english: I got most of the questions right .
sentences.chinese: 大部分问题我都答对了。

sentences.english: His ideas have now been proved right .
sentences.chinese: 他的观点现已证明是对的。

detailed_translations.english: a statement or piece of information that is right is correct and based on true facts
exactly in a particular position or place
used to check if what you have said is correct
exactly in a particular position or place

sentences.english: She held out her left hand.
sentences.chinese: 她伸出左手。

sentences.english: a scar on the left side of his face
sentences.chinese: 他左脸上的伤疤

detailed_translations.english: your left side is the side of your body that contains your heart

sentences.english: Draw a circle 10cm in diameter.
sentences.chinese: 画一个直径10厘米的圆形。

sentences.english: Johnson was part of the President’s inner circle (= the people who have the most influence ) .
sentences.chinese: 约翰逊是总统核心集团的人。

sentences.english: Sooner or later, fashion comes full circle.
sentences.chinese: 时尚迟早会流行回来的。

sentences.english: This is the road that circles the city.
sentences.chinese: 这就是那条环城路。

detailed_translations.english: a completely round shape, like the letter O
to move in the shape of a circle around something, especially in the air

sentences.english: a pattern of dots
sentences.chinese: 圆点图案

sentences.english: She never dots her i’s.
sentences.chinese: 她从来不在i上面加点。

detailed_translations.english: a small round mark or spot
to mark something by putting a dot on it or above it

name: speed
trans: 画笔绘制的速度，s为0-10的整数(1-10越来越快,0表示最快)

sentences.english: I got caught speeding on the A40 yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我在 A40 号干线公路上超速行驶被逮到。

detailed_translations.chinese: 飞驰，迅速前进，急行；加速；超速行驶
detailed_translations.english: to be driving faster than the legal limit
the rate at which something moves or travels

detailed_translations.chinese: 快速传送； 促进， 使加速
detailed_translations.english: to take someone or something somewhere very quickly

name: pendown
trans: 移动时绘制图形，缺省时也为绘制，简化为down()

name: penup
trans: 移动时不绘制图形，提起笔，用于另起一个地方绘制时用，简化为up()

name: goto
trans: 将画笔移动到坐标为x,y的位置

name: setx
trans: 将当前x轴移动到指定位置

name: sety
trans: 将当前y轴移动到指定位置

name: setheading
trans: 设置当前朝向为angle角度，简化为seth(angle)

name: home
trans: 设置当前画笔位置为原点(0,0)，并恢复默认朝向为向东(0)

sentences.english: They have a beautiful home in California.
sentences.chinese: 他们在加州有个美丽的家。

sentences.english: Good luck in your new home!
sentences.chinese: 祝你在新家一切顺利！

sentences.english: A family of birds made their home (= started living ) under the roof.
sentences.chinese: 一窝鸟在屋顶下安了家。

sentences.english: These children need a proper home life.
sentences.chinese: 这些孩子需要正常的家庭生活。

detailed_translations.english: the house, apartment, or place where you live
relating to or belonging to your home or family

name: pensize
trans: 绘制图形时的画笔宽度

sentences.english: What shape is the table?
sentences.chinese: 那张桌子是什么形状的？

sentences.english: You can recognize a tree by the shape of its leaves.
sentences.chinese: 可以根据树叶的形状辨认出是什么树。

sentences.english: His battered old hat had completely lost its shape.
sentences.chinese: 他那顶破旧的帽子已经完全变形了。

sentences.english: The plants grow in every shape and size .
sentences.chinese: 这些植物有各种形状，各种大小。

sentences.english: The children cut out shapes (= squares, triangles etc ) from the piece of cardboard.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们把卡纸片剪成各种形状。

detailed_translations.english: the form that something has, for example round, square,  triangular  etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 形成；塑造，使成形；使符合
detailed_translations.english: to influence something such as a belief, opinion etc and make it develop in a particular way

sentences.english: What color dress did you buy?
sentences.chinese: 你买的连衣裙是什么颜色的？

sentences.english: jams that contain no artificial colors or preservatives
sentences.chinese: 不含人工色素和防腐剂的果酱

detailed_translations.english: red, blue, yellow, green, brown, purple etc

name: clear
trans: 清空turtle窗口，但是turtle的位置和状态不会改变

sentences.english: clear instructions
sentences.chinese: 明确的指示

sentences.english: The question wasn’t very clear.
sentences.chinese: 这问题不是很清楚。

sentences.english: It’s the clearest guide I’ve used.
sentences.chinese: 我从没用过这么清晰易懂的指南。

sentences.english: Perhaps I tried to cover too much and didn’t make myself clear (= express myself well ) .
sentences.chinese: 可能是我涉及的内容太多，没有表达清楚。

sentences.english: If you don’t understand, it’s best to say so and get things clear .
sentences.chinese: 如果你不明白，那就最好照直说并把事情弄清楚。

sentences.english: If I catch you smoking again, you’re grounded. Do I make myself clear (= used when you are angry ) ?
sentences.chinese: 如果再让我发现你抽烟，我就罚你不准出门。我的话你听清楚了吗？

sentences.english: Snowplows have been out clearing the roads.
sentences.chinese: 扫雪机已经出动，去清扫路面了。

detailed_translations.english: expressed in a simple and direct way so that people understand
to make somewhere emptier or tidier by removing things from it

name: reset
trans: 清空窗口，重置turtle状态为起始状态

sentences.english: She was careful to reset the alarm before she left the office.
sentences.chinese: 在离开办公室之前，她小心翼翼地重设了警报器。

detailed_translations.english: to restart a computer without switching the power off
